sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import Modal from '../Component/Modal' import { loginAction } from '../Store/Action/LoginAction' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' const Login = ({ onClose }) => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const submit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() const credential = { "email": e.target.email.value, "password": e.target.password.value } loginAction(dispatch, credential) } return (<> {/*} // //
//
//

Login

// //

// //

// // //
//
// */}

Sign In to Bazaar

or
Email or phone number* *
Password* *
Forgot Password?
Don't have an account? Sign Up
) } export default Login
